Address.label: Address
Address.value: 140 INDUSTRIAL BOULEVARD, BAINBRIDGE, Georgia, 39817, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Danimer Scientific producer of biopolymers in Bainbridge GA manufactures PHA bioplastics from renewable natural resources. Danimer plastics are 100% biodegradable and compostable and equal or exceed petroleum-based plastic commodities for price and performance. Danimer Scientific creates bioplastic feedstock from canola oil enabling global brand owners to utilize environmentally responsible materials in products that consumers purchase every day. Danimer makes commercial grade PHA using world-class production systems offering a scalable durable and cost effective material that reduces manufacturing dependence on non-renewable diminishing resources. Danimer also offers specialty toll manufacturing at their facility.
